thread.title: COMMUNITY CALENDAR

title: COMMUNITY CALENDAR
text: Writer Posted Oct. 22, 2015 at 6:00 AM Posted Oct. 22, 2015 at 6:00 AM Thursday, Oct. 22 5 p.m. - LAHS volleyball vs. Rye Friday, Oct. 23 1 to 2:30 p.m. - Scavenger hunt, Las Animas/Bent County Library 7 p.m. - LAHS football vs. Holly Saturday, Oct. 24 7 p.m. - Addiction Recovery Anonymous, 227 Sixth St. 7 p.m. - Depression Anonymous, (719) 980-2716 Monday, Oct. 26 7 p.m. - Neighborhood Watch meeting, 227 Sixth St. Tuesday, Oct. 27 Noon - Lions Club, Bent's Fort Inn Wednesday, Oct. 28 4 to 5 p.m. - Mini-M&Ms, McClave United Methodist Church 4:30 to 6 p.m. - Five Loaves Food Pantry, former McClave grocery store   Writer
